long_description: was established in 2013 in barcelona, spain with the inspiring idea of two cyclist brothers to create a shop with tons of energy dedicated to the world of the urban cycling. specifically, offering the best bike rental service, electric equipment and motorcycle to support the tourists and interested general public who want to enjoy barcelona by sustainable and ecological way. in 2015 we opened second shop at barrio gotico (carrer estruc,20) and in 2017 third shop carrer (carrer milans,50) with the aim to expand their business and offer the best service for our clients, now after 10 years we have more than 300 bikes and 20 motorcycles and 60 electric scooter in barcelona and become the best rent bikes shop in town. our staff/ employees are inspired and dedicated to present a unsurpassable service of renting bicycles with the best combination of prices and quality.

generated_description: rivera bike rental, legally known as rivera bike rental s.l., is a bike rental company based in barcelona, catalonia, spain. established in 2013 by two cyclist brothers, the company offers a variety of rental options including normal bikes, electric bikes, electric scooters, and motorcycles. rivera bike rental aims to provide sustainable and ecological transportation solutions for tourists and the general public. the company operates multiple shops in barcelona, including locations in barrio gotico and carrer milans, and has expanded its fleet to over 300 bikes, 20 motorcycles, and 60 electric scooters.
